page.title: 05NEW HOUSING IN LLANDYSUL
page.content: Building land is scarce along the valley sides so housing has developed away from the original village. The Beeches Housing Estate built in 1969 and 1972 has 131 dwellings. 16 private bungalows were built on the Parc yr Ynn Estate in 1972 and 31 private dwellings have been built on Llyn y Fran Rd. All these are on the high ground North of the village. In 1981 the 19 dwellings of the Tan y Bryn Council Estate were completed south of Pontweli. Some private bungalows have been built in the Gorrig area and eastern edge of the village. The rest of the area has isolated farm houses. The{Antur Teifi Organisation}buys vacant houses and, after improving them, rents them to tenants. Building seems likely to follow this pattern, with further development above the northern side of the village.
